participant_1.background:

Every day is a sweet taco-filled adventure.
i have a little sister.
my favorite singer is jess greenberg.

participant_2.background:
I'm a writer who loves to tell stories about my favorite super heroes.
I play classical music on my violin to relax after a long day of teaching lessons.
i have many girlfriends.
I keep my body and mind active through yoga and meditation.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love animals and the outdoors.

content.text: Hi! What's your name?
Hi! My name is (user 2's name).
What do you do for a living?
I'm a writer who loves to tell stories about my favorite super heroes.
That sounds fun! What's your favorite story you've written?
I'm not sure if I have a favorite, but I really enjoyed writing a story about Superman saving the world from a giant alien robot.
That sounds awesome! I love Superman.
Me too! He's my favorite superhero.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to play classical music on my violin to relax after a long day of writing.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play the violin.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm an English teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a teacher, but I'm not sure if I'm brave enough.
It's not as scary as it seems! I love it.
Maybe I'll give it a try someday.
You should! It's a great job.
Thanks for the encouragement
